channel.title: Ok... more errors...67

item.title: Ok... more errors...67
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Add me to MSN and I will take a look at the source :)[/font]

Read full topic

item.title: Ok... more errors...67
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

lol can you please speak in terms a nub would know? ive only been coding for about 2 months now and i havent got in depth. The errors that are showing up are completly random because i didn’t mess with these. I just had 100 errors and someone was nice enough to download my client.java and upload it again for me. when i compiled the client he uploaded for me it went from 100 errors to 67. This is the most confused i have ever been when trying to look over my errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok... more errors...67
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Have you initialized the variables amount & fromSlot somewhere? preferably up the top.[/font]

Read full topic
